author: Anna Merlan, Kate Dries, Maxwell Strachan
title: FedEx's CEO Says It's Protecting Workers. Video From a Warehouse Tells a Different Story
description: FedEx has claimed to provide gloves, hand sanitizer, and other protective equipment to its workers, but video taken in a Wisconsin distribution center says otherwise.
content: On Sunday, March 22, FedEx chairman and CEO Frederick W. Smith went on Face the Nation to talk about how the novel coronavirus is affecting the U.S. economy, and to make a few specific claims about how his company is keeping workers safe. "We have massive eff… [+10541 chars]
